item.title: MY BOOKS
item.description: Updated 4-may-2015 / The read section is still incomplete Wish list Type Title Self Development [](http://www.amazon.com/Quiet-Power-Introverts-World-Talking-ebook/dp/B004J4WNL2/ref=sr_1_1_ha?s=digital-text&ie=UTF8&qid=1428625658&sr=1-1&keywords=quiet) Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking[](http://www.amazon.com/Quiet-Power-Introverts-World-Talking-ebook/dp/B004J4WNL2/ref=sr_1_1_ha?s=digital-text&ie=UTF8&qid=1428625658&sr=1-1&keywords=quiet) Technical Agile Principles, Patterns, and Practices in C# Currently reading Type Title Management and leadership [](http://www.amazon.com/Start-up-Nation-Israels-Economic-Miracle-ebook/dp/B004QZ9P6K/ref=sr_1_1?s=digital-text&ie=UTF8&qid=1428625919&sr=1-1&keywords=startup+nation)[The Tipping Point](http://www.amazon.com/Tipping-Point-Little-Things-Difference-ebook/dp/B000OT8GD0) Technical Software in 30 Days: How Agile Managers Beat the Odds, Delight Their Customers, And Leave Competitors In the Dust Read* *Incomplete list, most of the technical books are missing at the moment

item.title: My Stuff
item.description: My current setup for work & play consists of : Desktop Processor 4th gen Intel® Core™ i7-4790 RAM 24 Gb @ 1600Mhz Video NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 720 1GB DDR3 Storage Samsung 850 EVO 250GB 2.5-Inch SATA III Internal SSD Monitor 2x 24” Dell E248WFP (1920 x 1200) Keyboard Microsoft Natural Keyboard 4000 Mouse Microsoft SideWinder X5 Main Os Latests build of Windows 10 Laptop Processor 4th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-4600U (4MB Cache, up to 3.

item.title: Podcasts
item.description: This are the podcast i’m currently listening / viewing. If you don’t know what is a podcast i’m sure wikipedia explains it but basically are like radio / TV shows that i download to my computer and take with me on an iPod or other device to enjoy them where and when i like to. I listen to the audio podcasts when i commute to my work and when i workout in the gym.

item.title: About David
item.description: David Triana Software Craftsman My name is David Triana. I work out of my home office near Bogota, Colombia, for the Consulting Services Area at Microsoft, but this site, its content and opinions are my own and should not be interpreted as Microsoft’s position in any way. Currenty I work as a consultant, participating in the most impactful and difficult custom application developement projects imaginable (all details under NDA), and aspire to become a Software Development Engineer (SDE).
